hadiths.text: Jabir b. 'Abdullah repotted:The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: Verily people would be brought out from the Fire, and they would be burnt except the exterior (surfaces, fronts) of their faces; and they would enter Paradise

chapter.ara-name: باب أَدْنَى أَهْلِ الْجَنَّةِ مَنْزِلَةً فِيهَا
chapter.eng-name: The Status of the Lowest people in paradise
